description:
A Shard of Tesla is deliberately used in Chicago, where 3 of the 4 senior members of the Collad crime family are electrocuted. Botan and the others go to Chicago to find the Shard and its wielder, nicknamed "Preghiera," but find themselves in a gang war.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: "Kami no Kaminari" ni Tsuite no Kousatsu
